unit_learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate evidence based best practice management skills through comprehensive interprofessional lymphoedema models of care (Scientist and Scholar)
Use feedback from teachers, clinicians, peers and patients to inform self-evaluation and critical reflection of knowledge and skill development (Professional)

Discuss barriers and facilitators to implementation of different models of comprehensive interprofessional care for people with lymphoedemaÂ  and/or chronic oedemas in your local setting ( Engaged Global Citizen)

Demonstrate safe, effective, patient-centred skills and competencies in delivering high standard of lymphoedema assessment and management strategies through comprehensive interprofessional lymphoedema models of care (Clinical Practitioner)

non_scheduled_learning_activities.description: A component of this micro unit will be presented as a series of well designed learning activities with embedded readings and knowledge checks.

enrolment_rules.description: AQF level 7 in a health degree or recognised equivalent with national registration if required.

assessments.description: Multiple choice questions and short answer

data.subject_search_title: LYMP8011 - Comprehensive Interprofessional Lymphoedema Models of Care

school.value: Faculty of Medicine, Health and Human Sciences

data.description: This unit is one of a series of units examining specialist skill areas of clinical practice within lymphoedema and related areas of management and clinical relevance. In this unit you will explore comprehensive interprofessional lymphoedema models of care to guide and develop professional practice skills in management of lymphoedema and chronic oedemas and how these can positively influence an individual physically, functionally, psychologically, and financially. This unit will explore the integration of comprehensive assessment, clinical reasoning, communication and management programs to treat lymphoedema and chronic oedemas. In this unit you will reflect on latest evidence based practice and your own clinical skill and professional development through mentoring and reflective activities. The unit will assist your development of the Scientist and Scholar, Clinical Practitioner, Engaged Global Citizen and Professional graduate capabilities.
